DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Correlate gene expression profile progression-free survival ( PFS ) patient stage III IV follicular lymphoma treat cyclophosphamide , vincristine , prednisone without rituximab clinical trial E-1496 . - Determine immunoglobulin Fc-gamma receptor polymorphism predictive PFS patient . - Assess significance microenvironment construct tissue microarrays follicular lymphoma immunostaining relevant biomarkers . - Correlate relevant biomarkers clinical feature , response , PFS . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Tissue sample analyze gene expression profiling , microarrays predict gene expression , immunohistochemistry , immunoglobulin Fc-gamma receptor polymorphism analysis biological marker . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 175 sample accrue study .
